mapper.select:
SELECT DIC_TYPE_ID,TYPE_NAME,TYPE_CODE FROM SYS_DIC_TYPE WHERE 1=1
AND TYPE_NAME LIKE '%${t.TYPE_NAME}%'
mapper.update:
UPDATE SYS_DIC_TYPE
TYPE_NAME = #{TYPE_NAME},
TYPE_CODE = #{TYPE_CODE},
IS_USE = #{IS_USE},
WHERE DIC_TYPE_ID = #{DIC_TYPE_ID}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM SYS_DIC_TYPE WHERE 1=2
OR DIC_TYPE_ID IN (${DIC_IDS})

DELETE FROM SYS_DIC WHERE 1=2
OR TYPE_ID IN (${DIC_IDS})
mapper.select:
SELECT DIC_ID, TEXT, VALUE, SYS_DIC.IS_USE, PID, TYPE_ID, SYS_DIC_TYPE.TYPE_CODE, SYS_DIC_TYPE.TYPE_NAME, SYS_DIC_TYPE.IS_USE TYPE_IS_USE FROM SYS_DIC INNER JOIN SYS_DIC_TYPE ON SYS_DIC.TYPE_ID = SYS_DIC_TYPE.DIC_TYPE_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND SYS_DIC_TYPE.TYPE_CODE = #{TYPE_CODE}

SELECT
FROM SYS_DIC WHERE 1=1 AND DIC_ID = #{DIC_ID}
mapper.update:
UPDATE SYS_DIC
TEXT = #{TEXT},
VALUE = #{VALUE},
TYPE_ID = #{TYPE_ID},
IS_USE = #{IS_USE},
WHERE DIC_ID = #{DIC_ID}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM SYS_DIC WHERE 1=2
OR DIC_ID IN (${DIC_IDS})
